## üéØ About Me
- üéì I'm a hacker with a degree in Software Engineering and experience as a Cybersecurity Analyst and AppSec Engineer.
- üîí Currently building a career in **red teaming** and **bug bounty**.
- üå± Preparing to conquer the **OSCP Certification**.
- üé∂ Lover of house music, the beach, and sunsets. Occasionally, you‚Äôll find me playing Valorant.
- ‚úçÔ∏è Trying to post regularly ‚Äî feel free to **[check out my blog](https://y1m4r.github.io/blog/)**!
